name: CRONEWORLD RPG ADVENTURE - 1
description: CRONEWORLD is a fantasy-story telling rpg indie game. It is a game about humans fighting wizards with flying robot 'CRONES'. It's world has Eastern culture, Western culture, science fiction and magics.
minimum_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 3 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
